attributes.action: No To EU Flag In British Sports e.g. Shirts, Stadiums ect...
attributes.additional_details:
The European parliament voted on Thursday to adopt a plan for national sport teams to wear the EU logo on shirts. It also wants the EU flag to be flown at major sporting events reports the BBC.

This's gone far enough,This Is England, We never asked to be governed by Brussel's

rejection.details: This is a matter for the governing bodies of each sport.
